channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Mantra Health - New Health and Wellness Resource
item.description: To supplement on-campus resources, RPI has partnered with Mantra Health to bring you free, school-sponsored virtual mental health supports.
item.author: Students

item.title: ISE Professor, Dr. Jennifer Pazour, to Speak at The National Academies of Sciences, Engineering & Medicine Webinar
item.description: Join The National Academies of Sciences, Engineering, and Medicine on August 12 for a webinar on creating more resilient supply chains using the latest insights from the mathematical sciences. Speakers will discuss their work on optimizing supply chains, including ways to address drug shortages, improve military logistics, and leverage on-demand manufacturing. Register here: https://www.nationalacademies.org/event/45383_08-2025_building-resilient-supply-chains-innovation-by-the-numbers
item.author: Community

item.title: Computer Science Department Introduction to Research Poster Session | Aug. 13
item.description: Date: Wednesday, August 13, 2025 12:00 PM - 2:00 PM - This will be a showcase of the diverse and innovative research projects developed by our students. In this course, students explored various perspectives on research while delving deeper into their individual passions. The resulting projects highlight a fascinating blend of conventional and unconventional research approaches. From traditional methodologies to cutting-edge ideas, the range of topics reflects the students’ creativity and…
item.author: Community

item.title: Final Campus Cleanout Days of 2025
item.description: Environmental Health & Safety (EHS) and Environmental & Site Services (E&SS) are partnering with the campus community to encourage cleanouts of cluttered storage areas, offices, shops, and labs. Take advantage of these free events to prepare your spaces for the upcoming fall semester!
item.author: Community

item.title: Move-In Parking Lot Closures
item.description: Due to Fall move-in, and with permission from Parking & Transportation, there will be a series of parking lot closures between August 19th and August 27th. For a full list of parking closures, please go to the following link: https://sll.rpi.edu/announcements/move-parking-lot-closures
item.author: Community

item.title: RPI Forward (Elevating the Student Experience): A Unified, Student-Centered Approach
item.description: We are excited to share a significant step forward in how we support and engage our students, both personally and academically, and to invite you to learn more at our StuX@RPI: Exploring the Student Experience, Academic Hubs, and Advising event on Wednesday, August 13, 2025, from 9-11 a.m. at CBIS Auditorium.
item.author: Community

item.title: Coffee & Conversations | Aug. 14
item.description: Date: Thursday, August 14, 2025 11:00 AM - 1:00 PM - Students are invited to stop by for a cup of coffee, a little treat and an opportunity to socially connect with peers!
item.author: Community

item.title: Dr. Jennifer Pazour Named IISE Fellow in Recognition of Contributions to Industrial and Systems Engineering
item.description:
The ISE Department is proud to announce that Dr. Jennifer Pazour has been named a Fellow of the Institute of Industrial and Systems Engineers (IISE), one of the highest honors awarded by IISE. This prestigious recognition reflects Dr. Pazour’s sustained contributions to research, education, service, and leadership within the field of industrial and systems engineering. Her career centers around solving complex logistics and supply chain challenges through mathematical modeling and optimization.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Community
